game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple.
game.description: The high priest has gone missing, and the only clue is a cryptic map leading to the lost temple. Your mission is to retrieve the artifact before it falls into the wrong hands.

task.description: Search for any information about the temple's location. Ask around town and visit the local library to see if anyone knows anything about it.
Once inside the temple, search for a chest with the artifact. Be careful, as the temple is said to be filled with traps and puzzles.
Once you have retrieved the artifact, return it to Holgar. He will reward you with gold and reputation points.
